text: Hi Elizabeth, I hope the exhibition went well! Sorry I've been out of the office a lot in August. I was chatting to the tutors in our animation deptartment and they've shared some blogs with some exercises to explore to see if you 3D animation might be something you'd enjoy <http://escapestudiosanimation.blogspot.com/2015/09/how-can-you-tell-if-our-course-is-right.html>

attachments.title: How To Tell If 3D Animation Is Right For You?
attachments.text: free 3D software - yours to try for free! What is involved in a career in 3D animation?Â  A lot of what animators do day to day involves ...
attachments.fallback: How To Tell If 3D Animation Is Right For You?

text: It requires downloading Blender, which is free. Have you used it before?
You could also download a student version of Maya <https://www.autodesk.com/education/free-software/featured>. This is the software used most in industry for animation

attachments.title: Free Student Software Downloads | Autodesk Education Community
attachments.text: Unlock your creative potential with free access to 3D design software from Autodesk. Free software downloads available to students, educators, educational institutions.
attachments.fallback: Free Student Software Downloads | Autodesk Education Community
